wikipedia_page.main: Henry Edward Kenny VC (Irish: Annraoi Éamonn Ó Cionnaith; 27 July 1888 – 6 May 1979), was an English recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.

response: * Henry Edward Kenny, 1st Battalion, Loyal North Lancashire Regiment.

response: |Henry Edward Kenny || British Army || 1915 || First World War || Loos
* Henry Edward Kenny (1888–1979), British soldier awarded the Victoria Cross
